name: gtd-app
description: Todo List Application with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:shared && cd backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.test:all: npm run test:shared && cd backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.prod:update: git fetch && git pull && npm run build && pm2 restart gtd2
